Hey @mandeepsingh05! Looks like there may be some permissions issues during installation. Are you using a Node version manager like nvm? I would recommend using npm with nvm (which npm recommends) and trying again. This resolves a lot of these types of issues. Here is an npm article about this https://docs.npmjs.com/resolving-eacces-permissions-errors-when-installing-packages-globally. Let me know if this works!
